pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"ImmortalWrt 是 OpenWrt 的一个第三方分支，主要针对国人用户开发，提供更多的本地化软件包和设备支持。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"可以使用以下方法更换软件源："}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["修改 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/opkg/distfeeds.conf"}]," 文件，将源地址 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"https://downloads.immortalwrt.org"}]," 或 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"https://mirrors.vsean.net/openwrt"}]," 更改为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["然后运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"opkg update"}]," 刷新软件包列表。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或通过 sed 命令一键更改："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"sed -e 's,https://downloads.immortalwrt.org,{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}},g' \
    -e 's,https://mirrors.vsean.net/openwrt,{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}},g' \
    -i.bak /etc/opkg/distfeeds.conf","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["您也可以登录 LuCI 后台，进入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"系统"}]," -> ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"软件包"}]," 页面，点击 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"配置 opkg"}]," 并按上述说明完成对源地址的更改。"]}]]}]

meta.title: ImmortalWrt 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
